headline: U.S. Stocks End Mostly Higher on Day Three of Government Shutdown
summary: The Dow industrials climbed 0.5% to a new high. The S&P 500 rose by less than 0.1%, just barely cinching a new record close, while the Nasdaq Composite slipped 0.3%.

headline: Astera Labs Battles Nvidia And Broadcom As AI Chip Market Heats Up
summary: Astera Labs, Inc. (NASDAQ:ALAB), an AI connectivity specialist, faces a critical market juncture as competition intensifies and lofty valuations test investor patience. While the company is positioned to tap multi-billion-dollar opportunities with next-generation PCIe and UALink chips, potentially driving billions in content revenue from major cloud clients, its shares have pulled back amid concerns that much of this growth is already priced in. Bank of America analyst Vivek Arya initiated cover

headline: U.S. Stocks Open Higher as Shutdown Enters Day Three

headline: The Bull Case For Broadcom (AVGO) Could Change Following Landmark AI Chip Deal and Surging AI Revenues
summary: Broadcom recently reported record third-quarter results, highlighted by strong growth in AI-related revenue and a multi-billion-dollar custom AI chip contract, reportedly with OpenAI, along with a new partnership with Lloyds Banking Group and several new fixed income offerings to optimize its debt structure. The company’s growing leadership in AI, successful VMware integration, and new high-profile customer wins have led to positive credit rating upgrades and reinforced its positioning in...

headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks to Own for Decades
